channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 68 Edmonton Zone 45 South Zone 18 Central Zone 17 North Zone 34 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Tue, Apr 20, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Active VOC cases 10520 64 VOC Percentage 56.9% 0.171% Total VOC cases 18603 816 Total VOC recovered 8026 750 Total deaths from VOC 57 2 VOC specimens screened 40539 1592 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Mon, Apr 19, 2021
